title: i need some good tips for rumble
body: i need tips for runes/masteries  an for combos an stuff so ty if u can help an im going for mainly mid ap rumble

replies.body:
It would really help if you told us what you are playing with now. But my first tip, is to get all rank 3 runes, I noticed you have many rank 1 and 2 runes.

For Rumble you would want:
Magic Penetration Reds 
AP Quints 
Magic Resist or AP or CDR Blues
and Yellows are usually health or armor depending on the match up.

Those are the absolute basics, hopefully a real Rumble main will elaborate on this. The rank 3 runes are really important though.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=dLcJK8xn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-29T21:38:44.508+0000)

how much are rank 3s
